# Index

<!-- set up the dates over which the journal will run --> 
```{r  include=FALSE}
dates <- seq(as.Date("2018-01-01"), as.Date("2018-12-31"), by="1 day")
dates <- data.frame(date=dates, day=sapply(weekdays(dates), function(x) substr(x, 1, 1)))
```
